title: GentleBirth Pregnancy App
description:
TRANSFORM YOUR PREGNANCY JOURNEY WITH GENTLEBIRTH - THE #1 HYPNOBIRTHING PREGNANCY APP

Whether you're preparing for your first or next baby, GentleBirth has been created for you. Giving the gift of a GentleBirth can be the most memorable and impactful gift you give your baby.


Our app is engineered to redefine your pregnancy journey and gear you towards a positive and confident birthing experience.
Here are some potential benefits you could unlock with the GentleBirth Pregnancy App:
· Experience less pain during labor
· Lower anxiety and fear
· Experience shorter labor duration
· Reduced chances of unplanned inductions and unexpected cesareans
· Prepare your partners to be more confident and equipped
Our approach is to reduce fear and anxiety, and increase your confidence as you delve into the science of positive birth. Learn how the combination of positive psychology, mindfulness, meditation, CBT, and sports psychology can empower you to thrive during pregnancy, birth, and early parenting.
Inclusive and non-judgmental, our app is suitable for moms planning any type of birth – medicated, unmedicated, vaginal, cesarean, singleton, or twins. With GentleBirth, you're covered!


WHAT DOES GENTLEBIRTH OFFER YOU?
· Daily 'brain training' sessions: Includes short meditations, hypnobirthing techniques, affirmations, breathing exercises, and mindfulness.
· Curated playlists: Handpicked for sleep, anxiety, confidence during pregnancy, positive birth, and the 4th trimester.
· Personalized tracking: Motivates and guides your practice.
· Robust support: From our GentleBirth Team and an uplifting Community of over 10,000 members.


WE VALUE YOUR VOICE
We’d love t
o hear about your GentleBirth journey. For feedback or questions about pregnancy, birth, or the GentleBirth program, don’t hesitate to reach out to us on social media or email us at team@gentlebirth.com.


UNLOCK PREMIUM ACCESS

· Delve deeper into mindfulness, hypnosis, affirmations, meditation, and breathing techniques.
· Receive personalized daily recommendations, driven by AI.
· Listen effortlessly to curated playlists for every birth journey.
· Download sessions for offline practice - be prepared anywhere, anytime.
· No Ads

Ready to redefine your pregnancy journey? Give your baby the gift of a GentleBirth today!
For more information, please read our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy here:
Terms of Service: https://gentlebirth.app/terms/
Privacy Policy: https://gentlebirth.app/privacy/
